doc.title: 动画片
doc.body: Del is a song writer for the obnoxious Mr. Mega, and in love with Didi, Mega`s secretary. His quest to write a hit tune brings him to the wacky world of Flooby Nooby, where he just might learn to write songs from the heart.
doc.actors: Daniel Neiden.莫林 麦克艾赫隆.Marty Nelson.Emily Bindiger
